attributes.action: Have esa medicals to be voice recorded, and to have the same rights as accused criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
at present accused criminals have more rights than esa claimants. their interviews are recorded, esa claimants are not.
criminals are entitled to a on call duty legel expert, esa claimants are not.
criminals are allowed to see and sign out what has been written about them.esa claimants cant
if the atos doctor is proved to be putting in false info into the lima program,esa claimants cant sue the dwp.
